/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a vibrant urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, adding to the overall brightness of the scene. The sun is shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the colors of the cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of depth to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
